review: Such a great product. Very easy to setup and easy to use. Lots of options to cast content from to Chromecast. I hear the Wifi is a bit picky but I have it inches form the Wifi router and it works like a charm. On a dual antenna 150mbps each, I can cast content from my Plex server via Wifi to Chromecast which also obviously connected via wifi.I use my Chromecast connected to a power outlet and not powered by my TV. The amount of energy it consumes is low enough to keep it always on. Plus when powered using the power supply the chances of unexpected behavior, like wifi not strong enough while playing video etc, is lower.I have one major complaint though. If I watch high quality videos for a long time, the Chromecast overheats and freezes. The solution is to power cycle it and give it a few minutes to cooldown.
